## hpr3360 :: Android Malware Alert

 A type of malware nicknamed Joker has been infecting Android devices. In this episode we dig a little deeper into what this is and how it works.
Links:

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/7750448/what-are-dex-files-in-android#7750547
https://www.zscaler.com/blogs/security-research/joker-playing-hide-and-seek-google-play
https://blog.sucuri.net/2020/08/string-concatenation-obfuscation-techniques.html
